authority: http://caricom.org/jsp/community/revised_treaty-text.pdf Revised Treaty of Chaguaramas and http://www.caribbeancourtofjustice.org/wp-content/uploads/2011/09/ccj_agreement.pdf Agreement establishing the Caribbean Court of Justice
terms: Judges: until age 72, extendable to age 75 until 9 judges are appointed in addition to the president  President: 7 years, non-renewable or until age 72 (extendable to age 75 until 9 judges are appointed in addition to the president), whichever is earlier
